channel.title: Does somebody know why i get this when i start the server
channel.description: why i get this error on my server. [code]Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Bob. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18205) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:273) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: Does somebody know why i get this when i start the server
item.dc:creator: @kiprok kiprok
item.description:
@kiprok wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:6, topic:349861”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=446236.msg3275097#msg3275097 date=1279483210]
Mhm.

If you don’t mind, could you help him with his error?

I have no clue how to fix, I just know how to read compiler.
[/quote]

As far as I know it’s inevitable, since it’s due to the player’s/host’s connection that’s the problem with all the bytes not being sent or received.[/quote]
but now i don’t get the error but if i get attackt by many npc i will logout,why?
and how can i better parsing the packets?

Read full topic
item.source: Does somebody know why i get this when i start the server

item.title: Does somebody know why i get this when i start the server
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Mhm.

If you don’t mind, could you help him with his error?

I have no clue how to fix, I just know how to read compiler. :P[/quote]

As far as I know it’s inevitable, since it’s due to the player’s/host’s connection that’s the problem with all the bytes not being sent or received.

item.title: Does somebody know why i get this when i start the server
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]My bad.

I’m not all good with dealing with packets.

I just know what they do. :P[/quote]

Don’t worry. You learn from your mistakes; it’s what everyone does ;).

item.title: Does somebody know why i get this when i start the server
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Server failed to receive all packets.

Try checking the packets, or parsing the packets better.[/quote]

Server failed to receive all bytes of the packet*
